title: Research Skills and Information

vocab.definition: Looking for information to learn about a topic
A place where you can find information, like a book or website
Something that is true and can be proven
Something you ask when you want to learn more
The subject you are learning about

teachingNotes: Introduce basic research skills using picture books and simple websites. Teach students to ask good questions and look for answers. Practice finding facts about familiar topics like animals or community helpers.
